trans-unit.source: A trigger action that pauses a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
Use a PauseStoryboard with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to pause a Storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un PauseStoryboard con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>sospendere uno Storyboard.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: PauseStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: PauseStoryboard interessa solo un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>quando è attivo (dopo il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>Avvia).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the PauseStoryboard must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>il PauseStoryboard deve fare riferimento la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>che controlla che <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) per un esempio.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a Paused Animation When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered after it has been paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: A partire da una pausa animazione quando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>azione viene attivata dopo che è stata sospesa, viene visualizzato per riprendere e riavviare.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: That's not what actually happens, however: the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action actually replaces itself with an unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: Che non viene effettivamente visualizzata, tuttavia: il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>azione sostituisce la stessa con una versione non sospesa.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Each time a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered, clock objects are created for its storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Ogni volta che un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>azione viene attivata, vengono creati oggetti orologio dello storyboard.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: Questi orologi vengono distribuiti alle proprietà animate.

trans-unit.source: So, when a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is triggered again, it doesn't restart its clocks, it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, quando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>viene attivato, non vengono riavviati clock, li sostituisce con nuovo orologi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard"> </xref> classe.
